cancelClaim(bytes32).details: Allows issuer to revoke claim if email was sent to wrong person

createEmailClaim(bytes32,bytes32,uint256.details: Only token admin can create claims

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

redeemClaim(bytes32,address,bytes32).details: Anyone can call with correct secret (from email link)      This is typically called via paymaster so user doesn't need gas

createEmailClaim(bytes32,bytes32,uint256.notice: Create a claim for email recipient

getClaim(bytes32).notice: Get claim details (excludes secret for security)

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes
